title: Jessica Henwick eyed for a lead role in The Matrix 4
text:
The cast of Warner Bros. The Matrix 4 keeps growing and growing, with Iron Fist star Jessica Henwick being eyed to star.

Deadline reports that the 27 year old actress is in talks for a lead role in The Matrix 4, though no details about her character were given.

She joins a cast that includes Keanu Reeves and Carrie-Anne Moss from the original Matrix trilogy, plus new additions Yahya Abdul-Mateten II and Neil Patrick Harris, while Jada Pinkett Smith is in talks to return as Niobe as well.

Matrix star: The cast of Warner Bros. The Matrix 4 keeps growing and growing, with Iron Fist star Jessica Henwick being eyed to star

Sources claim that Henwick performed 'quite strongly' during her audition, and that director/co-writer Lana Wachowski wants to have a female character similar to Reeves' Neo at the forefront of The Matrix 4.

There had been rumors of a new Matrix movie, for several months, with Warner Bros. confirmed the movie is happening in August.

Lana Wachowski, who co-wrote and directed the original trilogy with sibling Lilly Wachowski, is directing and producing alongside Grant Hill, who produced the sequels The Matrix Reloaded and The Matrix Revolutions.

Strong audition: Sources claim that Henwick performed 'quite strongly' during her audition, and that director/co-writer Lana Wachowski wants to have a female character similar to Reeves' Neo at the forefront of The Matrix 4

Wachowski also co-wrote with two writers she's worked with in the past, Cloud Atlas and Sense8 writer David Mitchell and another Sense8 writer, Aleksandr Hemon.

Warner Bros. and New Line Cinema have not yet set a release date at this time, and it remains to be seen when production will begin.

With the cast coming together as quickly as it has, it's possible filming could start early next year, though that has yet to be confirmed.

Director: Wachowski also co-wrote with two writers she's worked with in the past, Cloud Atlas and Sense8 writer David Mitchell and another Sense8 writer, Aleksandr Hemon

The Matrix was released in 1999, becoming a huge hit with its revolutionary action sequences and high-concept story.

The original film follows a programmer/hacker named Neo (Reeves) who is recruited by Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne) and Trinity (CarrieAnne Moss) in a war against the machines who constructed our computer-generated 'reality.'

The Matrix was followed by 2003's The Matrix Reloaded and 2004's The Matrix Revolutions, with all three movies grossing $1.6 billion worldwide.

Big hit: The Matrix was released in 1999, becoming a huge hit with its revolutionary action sequences and high-concept story

Henwick, a Surrey U.K. native, is the daughter of a Singaporean Chinese mother and Zambian English father, who got her break at just 17 years of age with BBC's Spirit Warriors, making her the first actress of East Asian descent to lead a UK TV series.

She would go on to star as Nymeria Sand in HBO's Game of Thrones before landing the role of Colleen Wing in Marvel's Iron Fist on Netflix, which she reprised in Netflix's The Defenders.

The actress will also star in four movies arriving next year, Underwater, due out January 10, 2020, Monster Problems, arriving March 6, 2020, Godzilla vs. Kong debuting March 13, 2020 and On the Rocks, which doesn't have a release date.
description: The cast of Warner Bros. The Matrix 4 keeps growing and growing, with Iron Fist star Jessica Henwick being eyed to star.
